                                    throws org.apache.maven.embedder.MavenEmbedderException,
                                           java.io.IOException
Creates a fresh MavenEmbedder instance.

Parameters:
listener - This is where the log messages from Maven will be recorded.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.embedder.MavenEmbedderException
java.io.IOException

resolveModules

public static void resolveModules(MavenEmbedder embedder,
                                  org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project,
                                  java.lang.String rel,
                                  java.util.Map<org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject,java.lang.String> relativePathInfo,
                                  BuildListener listener)
                           throws org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuildingException,
                                  AbortException
Recursively resolves module POMs that are referenced from the given MavenProject and parses them into MavenProjects.

Parameters:
rel - Used to compute the relative path. Pass in "" to begin.
relativePathInfo - Upon the completion of this method, this variable stores the relative path from the root directory of the given MavenProject to the root directory of each of the newly parsed MavenProject.
Throws:
AbortException - errors will be reported to the listener and the exception thrown.
org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuildingException
